attributes.action: De-criminalise non-payment of Television License Fee payment
attributes.additional_details: This fee is an anachronistic relic.  The BBC no longer speaks to half the nation, and what it does say is largely unwelcome to many people owing to the complete collapse of it's Charter mandated impartiality.
attributes.background: I derive no benefit from the BBC, having ceased to find it's output either worthwhile or watchable.  The current fee for a television license currently stands at over twice the cost of the subscription for the services I do watch.
